turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order an espresso from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you want a quad espresso, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a quad espresso to be picked up at the starbucks in westlake starbucks in daly city, ca, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it will be ready for pickup in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
